rooms.description: Traditional Kerala entrance hall with ornate woodwork and tiled flooring.
Open-plan living area that serves as a combined living room and dining space. Features large windows for natural light.
Fully equipped open kitchen with integrated storage. Incorporates Kerala design aesthetics such as wooden cabinets and tiled backsplash.
Spacious master bedroom facing east for auspicious light and calm ambience. Includes an en-suite bathroom.
Additional bedroom with traditional Kerala design elements; ideally placed on the north side to maintain Vastu balance.
Smaller bedroom intended for a joint family member. Placed in the south area as per Vastu guidelines.
Common bathroom located conveniently on the ground floor.
Dedicated private gym area with space for exercise equipment, soundproofing and ample ventilation. Positioned at a corner to minimize disturbances.

openings.description: Traditional Kerala door with intricate wood carvings and a tiled pathway leading from the entrance hall.
Large windows offering natural lighting to the living room and kitchen. Adheres to Vastu guidelines for auspicious placement.
Balanced openings for cross ventilation across the rooms.
Secondary exit door located in the garden or rear area, designed with local materials and aesthetics.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom on the upper floor for extended family usage with a private balcony.
Additional guest room that can serve as workspace or meditation area. Features natural light and Kerala style elements.
Quiet study space designed to encourage productivity and relaxation, with traditional Kerala woodwork details.
Balcony or utility area adjoining the living space, used for storage or as an outdoor sitting area.

openings.description: Windows for cross ventilation and to capture sunlight; designed according to Vastu principles.
Door leading from the living area or study room to the balcony, enhancing natural light flow and outdoor connectivity.
